Larry Tambascio wrote:

> I would recommend reading JUnit in Action and/or Pragmatic Unit
> Testing.  This will give you a good understanding of automated unit
> testing.  I haven't read JB's book JUnit Recipes (yet), so I can't in
> all honesty recommend it, but I imagine it will be helpful.

Why on Earth don't you have a copy of _JUnit Recipes_!? Several hundred 
of your friends do!
